title: Perch MVP: town overview TUI
description:
Goal: a beginner-friendly terminal UI to observe and steer a Gas Town workspace.

MVP acceptance:
- go run ./cmd/perch (or go run .) launches a TUI without crashing
- Shows a town overview plus sidebar (convoys, merge queue, issue summary)
- Keyboard-only navigation with help overlay and status footer
- Actions: refresh, open logs, boot/shutdown rig

Out of scope: web UI, multi-user, remote dashboards

title: Data layer: load rigs, agents, convoys, MQ, issues
description:
Implement data loaders that read:
- rigs registry + rig status
- agent sessions (tmux)
- convoys (gt convoy list --json)
- merge queue (gt mq list --json)
- issue summary (bd list)
Include refresh + error handling.
close_reason: Implemented data layer with types, loaders, and store for rigs, agents, convoys, MQ, and issues

title: Layout shell: overview + sidebar + details + footer
description: Create the core TUI layout (overview area, sidebar lists, detail panel, footer). Handle resize and minimal styling.
close_reason: Implemented TUI layout shell with overview, sidebar, details, and footer panels. Uses bubbletea and lipgloss. Handles resize, tab navigation, and minimal styling.

title: Overview renderer: town map + rig clusters
description: Render a town overview with rigs clustered and agents as units. Deterministic layout and simple legend.
close_reason: Implemented overview renderer with town map showing rig clusters and agents. Deterministic layout, color-coded status, and legend. Tests passing.

title: Navigation + selection + keymap
description: Vim-style navigation across panes, selection model, and help overlay. Keep keys consistent and discoverable.
close_reason: Implemented vim-style navigation (h/l/j/k), selection model, help overlay (?), and updated footer keybindings

title: Panels: convoys, merge queue, agents
description: Sidebar lists for convoys + merge queue + agents with basic details. Detail pane shows selected item summary.

title: Actions: refresh, boot/shutdown, open logs
description: Wire actions to Gas Town commands. Provide clear status messages and safe confirmation for destructive actions.
close_reason: Implemented refresh, boot/shutdown, and open logs actions with status messages and confirmation dialogs

title: Status bar + tick loop
description: Add periodic refresh, connection status, and lightweight HUD indicators (e.g., last refresh, errors).
close_reason: Tick loop and HUD indicators implemented, rebased on be3dbec, tests passing, submitted to MQ as gt-5mh

title: Beginner onboarding + help overlay
description: Explain rigs, convoys, hooks, merge queue, and keymap in-app. Accessible via '?' and shown on first run.

title: Add verification gate (merge queue tests + role prompts)
description:
Implement workflow verification in the Gas Town way:

1) Add settings/config.json with merge_queue enabled, run_tests=true, test_command="go test ./...".
2) Update internal/templates/roles/polecat.md.tmpl to require running tests before gt mq submit (include exact command).
3) Update internal/templates/roles/refinery.md.tmpl to verify tests before merging and to reject/notify if missing.

Keep wording consistent with existing templates.
